import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Events=()=>{const[events,setEvents]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);// Fetch events data from the backend
useEffect(()=>{async function fetchEvents(){try{const response=await fetch('http://localhost:8000/events');if(!response.ok)throw new Error(`Failed to fetch events: ${response.status}`);const data=await response.json();setEvents(data);setLoading(false);}catch(error){setError(error.message);setLoading(false);}}fetchEvents();},[]);if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center text-gray-600",children:"Loading Events..."});}if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center text-red-600",children:["Error loading events: ",error]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"events-container max-w-4xl mx-auto p-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-semibold mb-6",children:"All Events"}),events.map((event,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"event border border-gray-300 rounded-lg p-5 mb-6 shadow-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"event-title text-xl font-bold mb-3",children:event.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mb-3",children:event.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Location:"})," ",event.location]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Date:"})," ",event.date]}),event.image&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:event.image,alt:event.name,className:"event-image w-full h-auto rounded-lg mt-3"})]},index))]});};export default Events;
